# About {.unnumbered}
<div style="text-align: justify">
These notes were compiled from the lectures of **photonic Quantum Information Techonlogies (AT60205) Autumn 2023** delivered by [Prof. Syamsunder De](https://www.iitkgp.ac.in/department/AT/faculty/at-syamsundarde) and [Prof. Fabien Bretenaker](https://scholar.google.co.in/citations?user=im2WPmIAAAAJ&hl=en) at [Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur](https://www.iitkgp.ac.in/). The syllabus of the course can be found [here](./Syllabus.pdf).

The course content is based on the book Introductory Quantum Optics by @gerry05.

These notes by no means are complete and are not a substitute for the lectures. They are meant to be used as a reference for the course. If you find any errors, please feel free to open an issue or a pull request.
